title: Driver CPC: starting up an approved training centre

details.alternative_title: Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC): starting up an approved training centre
details.overview: How to start up an approved training centre to deliver Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) periodic training to lorry, bus and coach drivers
details.body:
You must be an approved centre to deliver Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) periodic training to lorry, bus and coach drivers drivers.

To deliver periodic training courses you must:

  1. Apply to the Joint Approvals Unit for Periodic Training (JAUPT) to become an approved training centre.

  2. Apply to JAUPT for your courses to be approved.

  3. Record details of all the training you deliver on to the Driving Standards Agency’s database when you’re approved.

How to apply

You can read more detailed guidance and apply to become an approved training centre on the JAUPT website.
